title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2053.7 - Location of records and hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2053.7 - Location of records and hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations
(a) Records shall
be made available at the office of the corporation, which is located at Two

United Nations Plaza, New York, NY. (b) The corporation shall accept requests for
records and produce records during regular business hours, which are 9 a.m. to
5 p.m. on business days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2053.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
